items.sentence: Tom has no qualms about stealing other people\'s food.
Tom is a good-looking guy, but he\'s not too friendly.
Tom is the only one here who doesn\'t like spicy food.
Tom is the only person I know who can\'t speak French.
Put out your cigarette. Smoking\'s not permitted here.
Red and blue lights flashed in Tom\'s rearview mirror.
Tom couldn\'t see the lake from where he was standing.
Why didn\'t you tell me that you wanted to go camping?
Do you remember the name of your first French teacher?
She argued with him about their children\'s education.
Tom explained it in detail, but I still don\'t get it.
You continue making the same mistakes time after time.
Tom kept a list of all the food he\'d eaten that week.
Tom made it quite clear what he didn\'t want us to do.
We have two dogs. One is black and the other is white.
A beautiful woman like you shouldn\'t be eating alone.
I spend about three hours a week practicing the cello.
I thought Tom was supposed to be here for three weeks.
I want to find out what kind of food Tom wants to eat.
Tom didn\'t have enough experience to do the job well.
